title: Little El Cid no Bouken (Adventures of Little El Cid)
synopsis: A boy named Rui Diaz De Vivar wants to become a knight. To do so he must travel the king of Castilla.
voices: ['Watanabe, Naoko', 'Watanabe, Naoko', 'Shibata, Hidekatsu', 'Yanami, Jouji', 'Azusa, Kinpei', 'Tsuboi, Akiko']
staff: [['Kurokawa, Fumio', ['Director']], ["D'Avena, Cristina", ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Seki, Shuuichi', ['Animation Director', ' Character Design']], ['Okuda, Seiji', ['Screenplay']]]
